config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES (default: true). * Optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is used to optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. In the code, the configuration is checked in the optimize method of an Expression class. If the setting optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries is enabled in the database settings, and the query is a single row query, the expression is optimized to return the single row value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is triggered whenever the optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries setting is enabled in the database settings and a single row query is encountered in the system. The frequency of triggering depends on the number of single row subqueries in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling the OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES configuration can have a positive impact on the system performance by optimizing single row subqueries to return the single row value directly. This can reduce the query execution time and improve overall system efficiency.
